name: Apunta y Dispara - Arcade Version 2.1 (Spanish Only)
name_original: Apunta y Dispara - Arcade Version 2.1 (Spanish Only)
description:
Here is my first game for this website : Apunta y Dispara

This game is a arcade game that you goal is too shoot fruits in the air using 12 differents weapons. This game is in Spanish and a bit of English, And is in currently developing.

Downloads are free. The game is almost finished, but i need to apply a patch, because is full of glitches.

I suggest you only pay 0,10€ if you want to help me in the developing of this game.

I will release this game on several months, this is a beta version.

This game support 1280x720 resolution, you need a monitor with higher or equal resolution that this, or you will have problems about clicking in the screen

--------------------

How to play :

Press 5 for insert a coin

Press F2 to access debug menu

Left mouse button : Shoot

Right mouse button : Reload

Wheel mouse up : Change your weapon menu (need to be closed after)

Wheel mouse down : Reload

Center button : Open weapons menu

Press F1 to view game info (Only in Spanish)

Press F4 to alternate window/fullscreen

Press F9 to make a screenshot

-------------------

I hope you enjoy and any questions send me a e-mail to carlitoshackerproducciones@gmail.com
